english.segment2: Unlike most I was made from your bones.
english.segment3: Its what you stole when you left my mamma all alone.
english.segment4: Every hero you were was shot to the ground.
english.segment5: As if superman had lost his mighty mighty strength.
english.segment6: Its not fair to go and leave me behind
english.segment7: No I didnt know what to think when the call came that night.
english.segment8: The motorcycles speed was no match against the semi truck.
english.segment9: I sat by your side and prayed hope for life.
english.segment10: It didnt matter to you so you made your escape.
english.segment11: Its not fair to go and leave me behind
english.segment12: Just because you have somewhere to go
english.segment14: You wished me away and I wish you well
